page.title: 10RELIGION 2
page.content: THERE ARE TWO CHURCH IN WALES CHURCHES IN THE AREA-ST.CATWGS IN CADOXTON AND ST.MATTHEWS IN DUFFRYN,NEAR BRYNCOCH. BOTH CHURCHES HOLD SERVICES EVERY SUNDAY AND A VARIETY OF OTHER ACTIVITIES DURING THE WEEK SUCH AS MOTHERS UNION,BELL RINGING,FLOWER ARRANGING AND A RAMBLERS CLUB. ST.CATWGS CHURCH,CADOXTON DATES FROM THE 13TH CENTURY AND HAS AN EMBATTLED TOWER.IN THE CHURCH YARD IS A GRAVE STONE RECORDING A MURDER AND KNOWN LOCALLY AS THE MURDER STONE. ST.MATTHEWS CHURCH, DUFFRYN IS UNDERGOING EXTENSIVE RESTORATION WITH THE HELP OF A TEAM FROM THE MANPOWER SERVICES COMMISSION (M.S.C.) THE OLD VICARAGE ALONGSIDE THE CHURCH IS A FINE BUILDING IN EXTENSIVE GROUNDS.
